title: Missing Font on save file on Ubuntu 24.04
body:
**Describe the bug**
Save dialogue when downloading a file is corrupted -- looks like the font is missing somewhere.  

**To Reproduce**
Steps to reproduce the behaviour:
1. Click to download the file anywhere in Teams  
2. When dialogue pops up no text just boxes appearing 

**Expected behaviour**
Readable font 

**Screenshots**
![Screenshot from 2024-07-10 15-01-21](https://github.com/IsmaelMartinez/teams-for-linux/assets/21171199/ae5d1257-e7ac-4f85-b272-321ce2a86434)

**Desktop (please complete the following information):**
 - OS: Ubuntu 24.04
 - Installation package: snap
 - Version: Latest/stable -- 1.7.5 -- snap-id: IIAJhVGfBhm393UTagoW5awtZlPDGqHd
 
**Debug**
There are few issues showing -- when download clicked nothing changes in the log. 

If required can be provided on PM. 

**Additional context**
--
